title: New Oakley Encoder Strike Vented sunglasses boost airflow to reduce fogging
content:
Oakley has unveiled new Encoder Strike Vented sunglasses, with a similar lens design to the Oakley Kato and offering greater air flow to reduce fogging and better regulate your temperature.

The sunnies form part of Oakley’s 2023 cycling collection. That range also contains three road bike helmets, including the AR03 Allroad that has a removable visor for gravel riding.

Along with road cycling jerseys and bib shorts, Oakley has released the WMNS Factory Pilot RC shorts. The water-repellent mountain bike shorts have a removable chamois.

Oakley Encoder Strike Vented Sunglasses

Oakley says the Encoder Strike Vented takes style inspiration from its classic Razor Blades. A line of vents at the top of the lens are said to accentuate air flow, reducing fogging when things get steamy.

The Encoder Strike lens uses O Matter material for strength and PhysioMorphic geometry, first seen on the Oakley Kato, to achieve its wraparound shape, according to the brand.

The cycling sunglasses are available with Prizm technology, which is claimed to ensure clear vision in various light conditions, in a choice of seven colours.

The Oakley Encoder Strike Vented costs £210 / $255 / €235 / AU$330. 

Latest deals

Oakley road and gravel bike helmets

Oakley

The Oakley AR03 Allroad’s detachable visor connects to the helmet with two magnets to protect your eyes from sun and debris on your gravel bike.

The helmet comes with MIPS, 19 vents, including slots to stow your sunglasses at the front, and an antimicrobial lining.

It costs £127 / $155 / €150 / AU$199.95.

The Oakley AR03 Race is claimed to be 20 per cent lighter than its predecessor, and both aerodynamic and well ventilated. The MIPS-specced helmet is priced at £170 / $205 / €205 / AU$299.95.

Latest deals
Oakley

Oakley says it has improved the fit of the ARO3 Endurance, so the helmet sits lower, and therefore more stably, on the head while better matching the skull’s curves.

A twICEme medical ID NFC chip at the back of the helmet can be used to store the details of your emergency contacts.

The £110 / $135 / €130 / AU$169.95 helmet also has MIPS, sunglasses storage slots and an antimicrobial lining.

Latest deals

Oakley 2023 road cycling clothing

Oakley

The Endurance Ultra Bib shorts are designed for long-distance days. They’re treated with a DWR coating for water repellence and UPF 50+ to provide excellent sun protection, according to Oakley. They cost £142.

Meanwhile, the Endurance Mix Bib shorts are also finished with a UPF 50+ treatment. Oakley claims the shorts are lightweight and breathable. The seamless New Cadence chamois increases blood flow and reduces numbness to improve comfort, according to Oakley. The Endurance Mix Bib costs £123.

The Endurance Dazzle Camo Jersey features a striking print, sweat-wicking technology, which Oakley says helps to keep you dry, and three rear pockets, with one zipped pocket. The jersey will set you back £128.

Latest deals

Oakley 2023 mountain bike clothing

Oakley

Oakley says the Seeker ’75 SS jersey suits everything from downhill to enduro riding. The mountain bike jersey is made from stretchy, breathable fabric. A ’75 graphic sits on the sleeves and an Oakley Factory Pilot logo covers the chest.

The jersey is priced at £52 and the matching Seeker ’75 Short is £85.

Latest deals
Oakley

 

Latest deals

There is also a new short-sleeve, V-neck mesh top called the WMNS Factory Pilot jersey. It costs £47.

The Oakley Maven RC SS jersey and Maven MTB Cargo Short are said to be breathable and water resistant with pockets to carry trail essentials. The jersey is priced at £57 and the shorts at £109.

author: Jack Evans
